title: Suspect in Brooklyn subway train shooting has been arrested, officials say - CNN
content:

description: The man suspected of shooting 10 people on a subway train in Brooklyn on Tuesday was arrested by patrol officers in New York's East Village neighborhood on Wednesday afternoon, officials said.
